page.title: 16A VILLAGE WOMAN'S DAY
page.content: {8 am}Get up, wash, have breakfast, wash up, tidy, hoover, make beds. {10 am}Go to shops & any other messages {11 am}Have coffee and prepare lunch for around{12.30.} After washing up get washed and changed to be at home to callers or go calling {3.30 pm} Prepare and make dinner for {5 pm.}After washing up yet again attend WI meeting, go out with husband or friends, knit and watch TV or read. {11-11.30 pm} bedtime This is one easy day made easier by having Duvets, microwave ovens, automatic washing machines and other labout saving devices. We do have days when we clean windows, washing days, baking days and days when we give an extra special clean up- & if we have any spare time we can then sit with our feet up & have 40 winks.
